targetString: Antibootiga qaar ayaa la ogaaday in ay dhicin karto in dib loogu isticmaalo daawaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 qaataha): Ayay Jayna Ansixisay.

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Sidoo kale tijaabada Talyaaniga iyo Jayna. Eeh Tociluzuman#COVID-19.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Weli ma cada xaalada ka iman karta inta uurka la leeyahay oo ay ku jiraan macaanka, wadne xanuunka, hypercoagulability ama kacsanaan taas oo khatar dheeraad ah ku keeneysa dadka uurka leh maadaama oo loogu talo geley dadka aan uurka lahayn. Macluumaadka kooban ee laga hayo, u wareego qaybta sadexaad ee uurka ayaa dhici karta inayna iman, ama inay siday ku timaadaa ay yaraato.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: In kasta oo aanu jirin talaal dhamaystay tijaabada, waxaa jirta dhawr iskuday oo socda oo lagu doonayo in lagu sameeyo talaal.

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Dhamaadkii Febraayo 2020, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay sheegey inayna filanaynin in la helo talaal SARS-CoV-2, fayrus daran, in la helo 18 bilood ee soo socda.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Shan talaal ayaa lasoo xushay Waji I ee daraasada amaanka ee Abriil.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: COVID-19 waxaa la ogaaday Diseember 2019.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: Safmar balaadhan oo wada gaashay caalamka 2020, kaas oo horseeday in maalgalin iyo dawlo badan oo daraasadeed lagu sameeyo sidii loo heli lahaa talaal.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Hay'ado badan ayaa isticmaalaya cayayaan si looga sameeyo talaalada SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Sida la sheegey Abriil, barnaamika CEPI ayaa wada samaynta talaalka oo markaa ku socda xawaare, awooda soo saarka, samaynta miisaanka, iyo helitaanka caalamka.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Abriil, Saynisyahabo CEPI ayaa sheegey in 10 madalood oo teknooloojiyad ay socdaan oo daraasadeed oo lagu samanayo inta lagu jiro horaanka 2020 talaal wax ku ool ah oo COVID-19 ah.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Madalaha waawayn ayaa bartilmaameedsanaya samaynta amaanka Waji I ee daraasada oo ay ku jiraan:

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: nucleic aysiidh (DNA iyo RNA) (Waji I waxaa la samaynayaa oo lasoo saarayaa talaalka lasoo xulanayo: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: qaabka fayruska (Wajiga I smaaynta iyo lasoo baxaya talaalka: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus nooca 5 fektor)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen saynisyahanada CEPI Abriil, 115 isku gayn talaal oo lagala soo baxay samaynta hore ee talaalka, oo waxaa la xaqiijiyay 78 mashruuc oo socda (79, sida ay sheegeen Milken Institute), 37 kuwa kale sheegeen, laakiin macluumaad yar ayaa laga hayaa (taas oo la sheegey in la qorsheeyay ama la nashqadeeyay).

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Wajiga I-II ee tijaabada ee la qorsheeyay ee amaanka iyo immunogenicity shaybaadhka ah, caadiyan si nasiib ah loola soo baxay, xakamaynta placebo, oo goobo badan ah, inta la ogaanayo wax cad, oo xadi wax ku ool ah.

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Tijaabada Wajiga III caadiyan waxa aku jira ka qayb gal badan, oo ay ku jiraan kooxda la xakamayeeya, iyo wax ku oolnimo tijaabada ee dalaalka kahortaga xanuunka, iyada oo lala socdo saamaynta xun ee ka faa'idaysiga xadida.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: 79ka talaal ee socda (ee la xaqiijiyay horaankii Abrii 2020), 74 ayaa weli aan lagu qiimayn bilaa aadanka (weli "tijaabada kahor" ayay daraasadu maraysaa).

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Ilaa 24 Janaayo 2020, Awstaraaliya, Jaamacada Queensland waxay ku dhawaaqday baadhitnaka talaalka molokulaarada ee macquulka ah kaas oo wax ka badali doona hide sidaha borootiinta fayruska si markaa loo sameeyo ficil difaac.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Ilaa 24 Janaayo 2020 Kanada, Xarunta Talaalka Caalamiga ah (VIDO-InterVac) ee Jaamacada Saskatcheman ayaa ku dhawaaqday bilawga shaqada talaalka, taas oo lagu doonayo in lagu bilaabi tijaabada bilaa aadanka 2021.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Mashaariicda soo saaraya talaalka ayay ku dhawaaqday Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Jayna 26 Janaayo 2020, Jaamacada Hong Kong 28 Janaayo.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Ilaa 29 Janaayo 2020, Shirkada Dawooyinka Janssen, oo uu ay hogaaminayso Hanneke Schuitemaker, ayaa ku dahwaaqay inay bilaabeen samaynta talaal.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Janssen waxay soo wada saarayaan talaal afka laga qaado biotechnology, Vaxart.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Maarso 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay soo wada saarayaan Vaxart talaalka.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Febraayo 8 2020, shaybaadhka OncoGen ee Roomaaniya ayaa baahiyay warbixin in uu nashqadeeyay talaal lamid ah ka loo isticmaalo kaansarka neoantigen talaalka ah ee daawaynta.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Maarso 25 madaxa cilmi baadhista ee hay'ada ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay soo gunaanadeen samaynta talaalka oo ay markaa bilaabayaan tijaabada.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Febraayo 27 2020, shirkada ay kaabto Generex, NuGenerex Ummo-Ancology, ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay bilaabayaan mashruuc talala oo laga sameeyay li-Key peptide talaal ah oo COVID-19 ah.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Waxay doonayaan inay soo saaraan talaalka lasoo xusho ee markaa lagu tijaabin karo bilaa aadanka "90 maalmood gudahood."

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Maarso 5 2020, Jaamacada Washington ee St. Louis ayaa ku dhawaaqday mashruuca samaynta talaalka.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Maarso 5 2020, Waaxda Cilmi Baadhista Ciidanka Maraykanka iyo Waaxda Talista ee Fort Detrick iyo Hay'ada Ciidamada Walter Reed Cilmi Baadhista Silver Springs, oo labaduba ku yaala galbeedka Maryland, ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay ka shaqaynayaan talaal.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Ilaa 10 Maarso 2020, Emergent Biosolution waxay ku dhawaaqeen inay la shaqaynayso Novavax Inc.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: soo saaritaanka iyo samaynta talaalka.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxay dadku ku dhawaaqeen inay qorshaynayaan tijaabada caafimaadka kahor iyo Wajiga I ee tijaabada caafimaadka Juulay 2020 ugu danbayn.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Maarso 12 2020, Wasiirka Caafimaadka Hindiya ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay la shaqaynayaan 11 qof oo aysoleeshin ku jira, oo ay dedejinayaan si ay ugu yaraan u qaadato wareeg hal sano iyo badh ah ilaa labad sano in la sameeyaa talaalku.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Maarso 12 2020, Medicago, shirkad bayooteknoolooji ah oo ku taal Magaalada Quebec, Quebec, ayaa sheegtey inay wado samaynta waxyaabo lamid ah coronavirus oo ay qayb kamid ah lacagtiisa bixinayso Hay'ada Kanada ee Daraasada Caafimaadku.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Talaalka laga soo xusho ee shaybaadhka, tijaabada bilaa aadanka ee qorshaynsan Juulay ama Agoosto 2020.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Horaantii todobaadkaan, The Guardian ayaa daabacay in Madaxweynaha Maraykanka Donald Trump uu siiyay CureVac "lacag badan si ay kaligood u qiimeeyaan talaalka Covid-19", in kasta oo ay dawlada Jermalku ay kasoo horjeedsatay.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Maarso 17 2020, Shirkada dawooyinka Maraykanka ee Pfizer ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay la shaqaynayso shirkada Jermalka ee BioNTech si ay uga wada shaqeeyaan mRNA-talaalka ah.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Talaalka ah mRNA waxa loosoo xushay BNT162, kaas oo wakhti xaadirkan lagu tijaabinayo inta aan caafimaad ahaan la tijaabin oo lana filanayo in la bilaabo tijaabada caafimaadka Abriil 2020.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Talyaaniga Maarso 17 2020, Takis Biotech, shirkad Talyaani ah oo baayootek ah ayaa bayaamisay inay heli doonaan natiijada tijaabada caafimaad kahor Abriil 2020, oo talaalka ay doortaan la bilaabi doono in lagu tijaabiyo bilaa aadanka dayrta.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Faransiiska 19 Maarso 2020, Iskaashiga Barnaamijka U Diyaar Garawga Safmarka (CEPI) waxay ku dhawaaqeen in US$4.9 milyan oo maal galin ah oo COVID-19 ah oo daraasada talaalka iskaashiga ee Istitut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Fuyeena, Astariya), Jaamacada Pittsburgh, taas oo ka dhigaysa wadarta CEPI ee maalgelinta talaalka COVID-19 lagu samanayo oo ah US$29 milyan.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: CEPI cida kale ee ay ka kaashanayaan ee ka maalgelinaysa samaynta talaalka COVID-19 waa Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Jaamacada Hong Kong, Jaamacada Oxford, iyo Jaamacada Queensland.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Maarso 20 2020, saraakiisha caafimaadka ee Ruushka ayaa ku dhawaaqay in saynisyahanadu ay bilaabeen ku tijaabinta xayawaanka til talaal oo lasoo xushay oo kala duwan.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Cilmi baadhayaasha Imperial College London waxay ku dhawaaqeen in 20 Maarso 2020 ay samayn doonaan talaal RNA oo COVID-19 ah oo iskii ah.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Talaalka waxa ay xusheen 14 maalmood gudahood markii ay ogaadeen safmarkii Jayna.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Dhamaadkii Maarso, dawlada Kanada ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay C$275 milyan ay ku maal gelinayso 96 mashruuc oo daraasadood oo markaa lagula dagaalamayo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan dhawr talaal oo lasoo xudhay oo shirkado iyo jaamacada Kanada ay wadaan, sida barnaamijyada Medicago iyo Jaamacada Saskatchewan.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Ilaa wakhtigaas, dawlada Kanada ayaa ku dhawaaqday C$192 mliyan oo si gaar ah loogu sameeyay talaalka COVID-19, iyo qorshaha lagu samaynayo ee qaran "kaydka talaalka" ee dhawr talaal oo cusub oo loo isticmaali karo safmarka kale ee coronavirus marka uu yimaado.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Abriil 2 2020, cilmi baadhayaasha Jaamacada Pittsburg Waaxda Dawooyinka ayaa sheekey in la tijaabiyo PittCoVacc, talaal COVID-19 oo jiirka lagu tijaabinayo, kuwaas oo sheegey in "MNA ay bixinayso talaalka SARS-CoV-2  S1 oo markaa antigent gaarka ah ee antiboodhigu ka jawaabo ah [jiirka] kaas oo markaa bilaabmaya 2 todobaad kamid marka la isku mudo."

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Kanada 16 Abriil 2020, Jaacamada Waterloo Waaxda Dawooyinka ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay samaysay talaal DNA-ga ah oo markaa sanka laga qaadan karo.

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Iyada oo la isticmaalayo bacteriophages, DNA waxa loogu talo geley in lagu badalo baakteeriyada bilaa aadanka su loosoo saaro fayrus wax u eeg oo aan waxyeelo lahayn, kaas oo samayn kara nidaamka difaaca jidhka si loosoo saaro antiboodhi loogu talo geley fayruska SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Maarso 2020, dawlada Maraykanka, warshadaha, iyo sadex jaamacadood ayaa isku keeney khayraadka si ay u helaan kombuyuuyar gaar ah oo IB ah, kaaas oo macluumaadkiisa laguu kaydiyo khayraadka Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, iyo Google.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Taalaalada qaar ayaa leh isku wax qabad, sidoo kale loo yaqaan wax qabad aan la cayimin.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Taasi waxay ka dhigan tahay in laga faa'ido karo wax ka badan kahortaga xanuunka.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Tijaabada nasiibka ah ee dheeraadka ah ee Awstariya ayaa lagu doonayaa xakamaynta ku biirida 4,170 shaqaale oo daryeelka caafimaadka ah.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Waxaa macquul ah in talaalka la sameeyay in aanu amaan ahayn ama aanu waxba tarin.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Daraasadaha hordhaca ah ee talaalka lagu qiimeeyo waxtarkiisa iyada oo la isticmaalayo COVID-19 gaar ah ee xayawaanka, sida jiirka lagu muday ACE2, shaybaadhada kale ee xayawaanka, iyo wixii aan bilaa aadan ahayn, waxay muujinayaan in amaanka heerka 3 ee talaabooyinka safmarka ah ee lagaga shaqaynayo fayrus nool, iyo wada shaqaynta caalamiga ah ee lagu xaqiijinayo heerarka nidaamka amaanka ah.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Talaalka SARS iyo MERS ayaa lagu tijaabiyay qaababka aan bilaa aadan ahayn.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Ilaa 2020, lama hayo dawo ama talaal inaga ilaalisa SARS kuwaas oo lagu arkay inay yihiin amaan oo waxna u tara bilaa aadanka.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Sida lagu sheegey warbixinaha daraasada ee lasoo saaray 2005 iyo 2006, aqoonsiga iyo samaynta talaalka novel iyo dawooyinka lagu dawaynayo SARS ayaa mudnaan u ahayn dawladaha iyo hay'ada waaxda caafimaadka ee caalamka oo dhan. Sidoo kale ma jiro talaal lagaga hortago MERS.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Markii uu soo baxay MERS, waxa loo arkayay in cilmi baadhista jirta ee SARS lagu heli karo shax wax ku ool ah oo lagu sameeyo talaalka iyo daawaynta caabuqa MERS-CoV.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Maarso 2020, waxaa jiray (DNA ah) talaal MERS ah kaas oo dhamaystirtay wajiga I ee tijaabada bilaa aadanka, iyo sadex kale oo socda, dhamaan waa talaal fayruska ah, laba adenoviral fayruska ah (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), iyo hal MVA fayruska ah (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Baraha bulshada waxaa lasoo dhigay boro bogaando lagu sheegeyo in fayruska keenay COVID-19 la garanayo oo talaalka hore loo sameeyay.

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Shirkadaha ayaa soo dhigay baraha bulshada ee kala duwan shirkada hore ee taxanaha hide sidaha iyo talaalka xanuunada kale ee coronavirus sida SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: b' Coronavirus waa koox fayrusyo xidhiidh leh oo markaa uu keeno xayawaanka wax jaqsiiya iyo shimbiruhu.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Calaamadaha caamka ah ee lagu yaqaan waxaa kamid ah xumad, qufac, iyo neefsiga oo dhiba qofka.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Calaamado kale waxaa kamid ah daal, murqo xanuun, shuban, cunaha oo xidhma, urta oo meesha ka baxda, iyo calool xanuun.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Marka la qaado ilaa inta calaamado la yeelanayo waxa caadiyan u dhaxaysa ilaa shan maalmood laakiin waxa ay u dhaxayn kartaa laba ilaa afar iyo toban maalmood.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: In kasta oo badanaa ay keento xanuun yar, waxaa jrii kara xanuun sanbabka ah oo fayrus iyo in unugyo badan shaqada joojiyaan.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Abriil 17 2020, wax ka badan 2.24 milyan oo kiis ayaa la sheegey oo ku sugan 210 dal iyo deegaano, taas oo keeney dhimashada wax ka badan 153,000 oo ruux.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Wax ka badan 568,000 oo ruux ayaa ka bogsaday. Fayrusku waxa marka kowaad isku gudbia dadka marka ay isku dhawaadaan, iyo xataa dhibcaha candhuufta ah ee qofka kasoo duulaysa marka uu qufaco, hindhiso ama uu hadlo.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: In kasta oo dhibcanahan ay keeno neefsiga, waxa ay caadiyan ku dhacaan dhulka ama meelaha la taataabto halka iyada oo la kala fog yahay la kala qaadi lahaa.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa ku qaadi kara marka ay taabtaan meel uu dul saaran yahay oo ay kaidbna taabtaan indhahooda, sankooda, ama afkooda.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Fayrusku waxa uu meel saarnaan karaa isaga oo nool ilaa 72 saacadood.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Waxa uu ugu faafitaan badan ayahy sadexda maalmood ee ugu horeeya kadib marka calaamaduhu soobaxayaan, in kasta oo ay macquul tahay in la isku gudbiyo wixii ka horeeya inta aan calaamado la yeelan. Qaabka caadiga ah ee lagu ogaado waa in qoraalka markaa ah ee jawaabta celinta polymerase (rRT-PCR) ee muunada duufka.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Isticmaalka waji gashadka ayaa kula taliyaa dadka looga shakiyo inay qabaan fayruska iyo dadka daryeela.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Talada isticmaalka waji gashadka ee shacabka guud way kala duwan tahay, oo maamulka qaar ayaa ka diga isticmaalkooda, qaar ayaa lagu taliya isticmaalkooda, iyo kuwa kalena waxay ka dhigeen waajib.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, ma jirto talaal uu leeyahay oo gaar ah ama dawo u cayiman oo lagu daweeyo fayruska COVID-19.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Isku gudbin mudo dheer ah xanuunka ah ayaa lagu sheegey badanaa dalalka dhamaan lixda deegaanka ee WHO ay ka shaqayso.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Caabuqyadaasi waxa weeye fayrusyada asxaanta u ah ama keena calaamada sida hargabka oo kale sida xumad, daal, iyo neefta oo qofka baqata.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Calaamadaha soo baxaya waxaa kamid ah mushkilad neefsiga ah, laab xanuun joogto ah ama cadaadis, dawakhaad, lugaynta oo adkaata, iyo wajiga ama danbaha oo buluug noqda; waxaa lagu taliyaa in markaba la doonto daawayn hadii calaamadahani ay jiraan.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Quwa aan sidaa u baahsanayn, calaamadaha neefsiga ee sare sida hindhiso, san duuf leh ama cunaha oo xidhma ayaa dhici karta in la arko.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Calaamadaha caloosha sida yalaalugo, hunqaaco, iyo shuban ayaa lagu arkay tiro kala duwan.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Kiisaska qaar Jayna ayaa markii hore lagu arkay laab xanuun iyo wadne garaac xoogan.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Meelaha qaar, xanuunku waxa uu noqon karaa sanbab xanuun, inay shaqayn waayeen unugyo badali, iyo dhimasho.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Tani waxaa loo yaqaan mudada bilaa calaadamada.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Mudada bilaa calaamaha COVID-19 caadiyan way gaaban yihiin oo waxay noqon karaan shan ilaa lix maalmood kuwaas oo qaar badan ay noqon karaan laba ilaa 14 maalmood.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: 97.5% dadka yeesha calaamadaha waxay ku yeeshaan 11.5 maalmood marka ay qabaan caabuqa. Warbixinaha ayaa muujinaya in ayna dhamaan dadka qaadaa yeelan calaamadaha.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: Kaalinta calaamadahan ay ku leeyihiin faafitaanka weli lama garanayo; laakiin, cadaymaha hordhaca ahi waxa ay sheegayaan in ay gacan ka gaystaan faafitaanka xanuunka.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Tirada dadka calaamadaha yeeshaa inta ay ka yihiin dadka xanuunka qaada lama garnaayo wakhti xaadirkan oo daraasad ayaa lagu wadaa, Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo kahortaga Xanuunada Kuuriya (KCDC) waxay sheegtey in 20% dhamaan inta la xaqiijiyay ee xanuunado ay yeeshaan calaamado inta ay isbitaalka ku jiraan.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayna waxa ay bilaabeen inay ku daraan kiisaska calaamdah leh kiisaska maalin kasta laga bilaabo 1 Abriil; oo 166 qof oo qaba caabuqa maalintaas, 130 (78%) ayaa yeeshay calaamado wakhtiga la baadhayay.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Xaakada iyo candhuufta qaar ayaa caaqi kara tiro badan oo fayruska ah.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Candhuufta tirada badan sidaa waxay soo saartaa dhibco badan oo marka loo eego inta aan sidin ah.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay Singaaboor ayaa lagu ogaaday in qufaca aan waxba la saarin afka in candhuufsiisu ay u duusho ilaa 4.5 mitir (15 fuudh).

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Inkasta oo fayrusku uu caariyan aanu hawada kusii jirin, Machadka Qran ee Saynisku waxa uu sheegey in isku gudbinta bioserosol ay macquul yahay iyo uruuriyayaasha hawada ee yaala barandooyinka banaanka qolalka dadku ay jiraan in laga heley fayruska RNA.

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Nidaamyada qaar ee caafimaadka sida xanuunada neefsiga iyo wadnaha (CPR) waxay keeni karaan in neefta qofka laga soo saaro taas oo markaa keeni karta in hawada neefta markaa ah lagu kala qaado.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: In kasta oo ay jiran walaacyo inuu ku faafo saxarada, khatarta tani waxaa loo arkaa inay yar tahay. Fayrusku waxa ugu badan ee uu ku faafi karaa waa dadka leh calaamadaha; inkasta oo ay macquul tahay in lagu faafiyo dadka aan calaamadaha lahayni, khatarta taasi way yar tahay.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortada Xanuunada Midawga Yurub (ECDC) waxa ay sheegee in inkasta oo ayna cadayn sida ugu fudud ee uu u gudbi karto xanuunka, caadiyan halkii qof waxa uu qaadsiiyaa laba ilaa sadex qof. Fayrusku waxa uu meel ku dul noolaan karaa saacado ilaa maalmo.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, fayruska waxaa uu ku noolaan karaa kaadhadhka dushooda hal maalin, waxa uu ku noolaan karaa sadex maalmood caaga (polypropylene) iyo birta (AISI, 304) mudo afar saacadood ah ee 99% koober ah.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Tani, laakiin, waxay kala duwan tahay waxayna ku xidhan tahay qoyaanka hawada iyo heerkulka.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Saabuunta iyo taydha ayaa sidoo kale saameeya hadii si sax ah loo isticmaalo; saabuuntu waxay burburisaa duxda fayruska ee xaga sare ka ilaaliya, iyo sidoo kale waxay ka saartaa maqaarka iyo meelaha uu saaran yahay.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Xal kale ayaa ah, sida benzalkonium chloride iyo chlorhexidine gluconate (jeermis dile), kaas oo waxtarkiisu uu yar yahay. Daraasad Hong Kong lagu qabtay, muunada candhuufta iyada oo la qaadanayo dawooin mudo laba maalmood ah kadib markii isbitaalka la is dhigay.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Shan ilaa lix bukaan, muunada kowaad waxaa lagu arkay xadi fayrus oo aad u badan, bukaanka lixaad waxaa lagu arkay inuu ka xadi fayrus badan yahay maalintii labaad ee la baadhay.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Xanuunka aadka u daran ee neefsiga coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) waxaa weeye xanuun aad u faran oo coronavirus novel ah oo neefsiga ah, sadexda qof ee ugu horeeyay ee aysoleeshinka la geliyay waxa ay qabeen xanuunada sanbabka oo isku xidhan oo xanuun neefsiga ah oo aad u daran ah oo Wuhan ah.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Dhamaan qaababka novel SARS-CoV-2 ee fayruska la xidhiidha coronavirus ee nolosha dabiiciga ah.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Jidhka bilaa aadanka banaankiisa, fayrusku waxaa lagu dilaa saabuunta guriga lagu isticmaalo, taas oo ka qarxisa lakabka ilaalinaya. SARS-CoV-2 waxa uu si dhaw ula xidhiidhaa SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Sanbabku waa unuga ugu badan ee uu saameeyo COVID-19 maadaama oo fayrusku uu ka geli karo unuga enzyme angiotensin-oo uu u badalo enzyme 2 (ACE2), kaas oo ku badan nooca II alveolar unuga ah ee sanbabka.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Fayrusku waxa uu isticmaalaa meelaha sare glycoprotein oo loo yaqaan "korodh" (peplomer) si uu ugu xidhmo ACE2 iyo unuga qaabila oo dhan.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: Dhaawaca daran ee wadnaha waxaa lagu arkaa 12% dadka uu ku dhacay ee la dhigay isbitaalka Wuhan, Jayna, oo waxaana uu aad ugu badan yahay xanuunka aadka u daran.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Xadiga xanuunka wadna ayaa ku badan, taas oo keena in uu olol yimaado jawaab celin ah oo uu khalkhalo nidaamka difaacu inta uu socdo, laakiin dhaawaca myocardial ee daran waxa uu sidoo kale la xidhiidhi karaa ACE2 qaadaha wadnaha.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Qaadaha ACE2 waxa aad loogu arkaa wadnaha oo waxaa kamid ah inuu wadnuhu shaqada joojiyo.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Korodh imaatinta thrombosis (31%) iyo venous thromboembolis (25%) ayaa lagu arkay bukaanka ICU ee qaba xanuunka COVID-19 oo waxa uuna la xidhiidhi karaa caafimaadkooda liita. Shaybaadhka wax ku ool ah ee lagu sameeyay dadka u dhintay COVID-19 waxaa lagu ogaaday inuu waxyeelay alveolar (DAD), iyo oo lymphocyte uu ku jiro gubasho filter garayn ah ee sanbabka.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Inkasta oo SARS-COV-2 uu leeyahay tropism ACE2-sheegitaanka unuga epithelial ee la socodka neefsiga, bukaanka qaba COVID-19 aad u daran calaamadaha ah ee nidaamka kacsanaanta ololka.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, xanuunka GM-CSF-ee daloolinaya unugyada-T waxa lagu arkay in ay xidhiidhaan imaatinta ololka IL-6 ee gelinta iyo adkaanshaha xanuunka sanbabka ee bukaanka COVID-19.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ololka lymphocytic waxa sidoo kale lagu ogaaday shaybaadhka maydka.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: WHO waxay baahisay dhawr shaybaadh oo lagu sameeyay xanuunka.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: Qaabka rasmiga ah ee shaybaadhka waxaa weeye in markaa la badalo qoraalka polymerase ee jawaab celinta (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Shaybaadhka waxaa kaliya lagu sameeyaa muunada duufka ee markaa lagu qaaday burushka sanka la geliyay; laakiin, muunada duufka ama xaakadu waxa ayaa sidoo kale la isticmaali karaa.

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: Natiijada ayaa caadiyan lagu helaa dhawr saacadood ilaa laba maalmood.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: Dhiiga ayaa sidoo kale la isticmaali karaa, laakiin waxa uu u baahan doonaa lama muunadood oo dhiig ah oo la qaado laba todobaad wakhti ku dhaxeeya oo natiijadana waxa uu noqonayaa waxoogaa dhaxaad.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: Saynisyahano jayniis ah ayaa gooni u saaray unuga coronavirus oo waxa ay baahiyeen hide sidihiisa si shaybaadhada caalamku ay si iskood ah ugu samayn karaan jawaab celin (PCR) shaybaadh ah oo lagu onaadao caabuqa fayruska.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: Abriil 4, 2020, shaybaadh antiboodhiga ah (kaas oo lagu ogaanayo caabuqa firfircoon iyo hadii qofku uu hore usoo qaaday) ayaa la sameeyay, laakiin weli si baahsan looma isticmaalin.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: Tijaabo Jayniis ah oo shaybaadhka ah ayaa lagu muujiyay inuu saxan yahay 60 ilaa 70%.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: FDA Maraykanka ayaa ansixiyay shaybaadhka meesha kowaad ee daryeelka 21 Maarso 2020 ee isticmaalka dhamaadka bisha. Tilmaamaha shaybaadhka ayay baahiyeen Isbitaalka Zhongnan ee Jaamacada Wihan qaabka ay talisay ee lagu ogaanayo ee markaa ku salaysan qaabka tijaabada caafimaad ee khatarta safmarka.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: Dhawr tibolaar laba dhinac ah oo muraag hoose ah oo opacities oo leh periphral, asymmetric posterior oo si baahsan loogu qaybiyo ayaa ah ka ugu caamsan.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: Subpleural badnaantiisa, samayska daran (lobular septal cufka ah ee kala duwanaanshaha), iyo isku dhaga ayaa noqon kara socod xanuunka ah.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: Macluumaad yar ayaa laga heleyaa diirada waynaysada iyo xanuunka COVID-19.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: Xanuunka ugu wayn ee lagu ogaaday shaybaadhka maydku waa:

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: Mascroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, isku keenista sanbabka iyo oedema baabacada

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: Afar nooc oo kuwa aadka u daran ah ee noocda fayruska ayaa la arki karayay:

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: waxoogaa xanuunka sanbabka: pulmonarty oedema, xanuunka sababka ee pneumocyte, noocyo balaadhan oo xanuunka sababka ah, olol xiidmaha ah oo leh soco lymphocytic iyo multinucleated ka yimid qaab samayska unuga.

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: xanuunka sanbabka ee daran: waxyeelada alveolar (DAD) ee gelitaanka alveolar ayaa laga reebey.

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: DAD waxa uu keenaa mushkilad dhanka neefsiga ah oo daran (ARDS) iyo hypoxemia.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: xanuunada sanbabka kulaylka: waxa ay sameeyaan ka saarida carjawada alveolar iyo xiidmaha snababka

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: Dhiiga: qaybin murqaha ah oo xidhan (DIC); jawaab celin leukoerythroblastic

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: Talaabooyinka lagu yaraynayo qaadida caabuqa waxa kamid ah joogitaanka gurgia, in la iska ilaaliyo meelaha dadku iskugu yimaadaan, in gacmaha la gu farxasho saabuun iyo biyo badanaa iyo in ugu yaraan 20 ilbidhiqsi la isku xoqo, in la ilaaliyo nadaafada neefsiga iyo in la iska ilaaliyo taabashada indhaha, sanka, ama afka iyada oo aan la farxalan.

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in la saarto afka iyo sanka kilinikis marka la qufacayo ama hundhisayo oo waxay ku talinayaan in la isticmaalo suxulka gudaha hadii aan la haysan kilinikis.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: Farxalka sax ah kadib marka la qufaco ama hindhiso.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in la isticmaalo maro nadiif ah oo wajiga lagu xidho meelaha banaanka ah marka loosoo baxo, si loo yareeyo isku gudbinta asxaamaha shakhsi ahaaneed. Kala fogaanshaha waxaa loogu talo geley in lagu yareeyo isku gudbinta dadka iyada oo badan isku yimaada meelaha dugsiyada iyo shaqada, xadidaada socdaalka iyo joojinta isku imaatinka dadka badan.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: Tilmaamaha kala fogaanshaha waxaa kamid ah in dadku ay isku jirsadaan 6 fuudh (1.8 mitir) in ah.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: Ma jirto dawo la garnaayo ee lagaga hortago COVID-19. Talaalkana lama filanyo inuu soo baxo ilaa horaanta 2021, qayb muhiim ah oo lagu maamuliya COVID-19 waa in la yareeyo kor u kaca faafista, oo loo yaqaan "yaraynta socodka".

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in badanaa lagu farxasho sabuun iyo biyo ugu yaraan 20 ilbidhiqsi, gaar ahaan marka suuliga lagasoo baxo ama gacmuhu ay uskag yihiin oo ay muuqdaan, kahor inta aan cunto la cubin iyo kadib marka duufka la iska fi'iyo, qudaco ama hundhiso.

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxaa lagu taliyaa in la isticmaalo gacmo nadiifiyaha alkohoosha leh oo ugu yaraan 60% alkohool ah, laakiin kaliya marka aan la heleynin sabuun iyo biyo. Meelaha aan lagu iibin gacmo nadiifiyaha, WHO waxay bixisaa talaabo loogu samaysanayo sidaada.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: Qaacidadan, hawsha antimikrobaatku waxa ka yimaada ethanol ama isopropanol.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
targetString: Hydrogen peroxide ayaa loo isticaalaa si meesha looga saaro kacsanaanta baakteeriyada ee alkohoosha; "maaha shay firfircoon".

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: Glycerol waxaa lagu daraa humectant.

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: Dadka waxaa lagu maamulaa daryeel la kormeeray, kaas oo ay ku jiraan daawaynta dheecaanada, taageero ogsajiin, iyo taageerida unugyada kale ee uu fayrusku saameeyay.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in dadka looga shakiyo inay sidaan fayruska ay xidhaan waji gashad.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: Ogsajiinta xabka extracororeal (ECMO) waxa loo isticmaalahaa sidii looga jawaabi lahaa mushkilada neefsiga, laakiin faa'idadeeda wali waa la eegayaa.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: Nadaafada shakhsi ahaaneed iyo qaab nololeedka caafimaadka iyo nafaqada ayaa la sheegaa inay kor u qaadaan difaaca.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: Daawaynta taageerada ah waxay wax u tari kartaa dadka leh calaamadaha yar wakhtiga hroe ee uu xanuunku ku dhaco. WHO iyo Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayniiska waxa ay baahiyeen talooyin lagu. ilaalinayo dadka la dhigay isbitaalka ee qaba COVID-19.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: Dhakhaatiirta xiidmaha iyo sanbabka ayaa isku daray daawaynta Marayknaka ee lagu taliyo oo kala heley hay'adp kala duwan oo waxay ka dhigeen khayraad bilaash ah, IBCC.

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: Abriil 2020, ma jirto wax daawayn ah oo cayiman oo uu leeyahay COVID-19.

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Calaamadaha, xirfadlayaal caafimaadka qaar ayaa ku taliya in baraasitimoosha (acetaminophen) laga doorbido ibubarafiinta marka hore.

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: Waa in laga taxadirtaa sidii loo yarayn lahaa khatarta isku gudbinta fayruska, gaar ahaan habdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaadka marka la samaynayo daawaynta keeni karta hawo la neefsado, sida intubation ama neefsiga gacmaha.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: Xirfadlayaasha daryeelka caafimaad ee daryeelka dadka qaba COVID-19, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in dadka la geliyo Qolka Aysoleeshinka Caabuqa Wada (AIIR) oo ka dheeraad ah in la sameeyo taxadirka caadiga ah, xidhiidhka dadka iyo taxadirka hawo kagalaya. CDC waxay sheegtey in tilmaamaha loo isticmaalayo agabka ilaalada shakhsi ahaaneed (PPE) inta uu jiro safmarku.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: Agabka lagu taliyo waa: PPE-ga dirayska, neefsiga ama waji gashad, indho ilaaliye, iyo golofiska gacmaha. Marka la heli karo, neefsiga (halka waji gashad) uu ka noqon lahaa ayaa la doorbidaa.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: Waji gashadka N95 ayaa loo ansixiyay shaqadan laakiin FDA waxa ay soo saartay in loo isticmaali waji gashad Ansixinta Isticmaalka Xaalada Degdeg ah (EUA).

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: Waxaa loogu talo geley in la iskaga ilaaliyo xanuunada hawada raaca sida dhaska laakiin waxa ay wax ka taraan wixii noole ah laakiin lama damaanad qaadi karo isticmaalka nooc kasta.

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: Marka aan la heleynin waji gashadka, CDC waxay ku taliysaa in wajiga la xidho, ama, hadii wax kale la waayo, in wajigashad guriga lagu samaysto.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: Badanaa COVID-19 aad uma adka ama waxba kama badalo qaabka, laakiin waxoogaa kiisaska ayaa sidaa ah.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: Noocyada taageerada neefsiga ee COVID-19 waxa uu la xidhiidhaa ku guul daraysiga neefsiga kaas oo si wanaagsan loogu daraasadaynayo dadka ku jira isbitaalka, taas oo cadaymo muujinayaan in tuunbo la is geliyo la iska ilaalin karo oo sanka la iskaga dhaadhiciyo ama laba heer oo hawo mareenka ah.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: Hadii labadani ay isku faa'ido leeyihiin dadka xanuunsanaya iyo in kale lama garanayo.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: Dhakhaatiirta qaar ayaa doorbida joogitaanka guriga qaab neefsi ah marka la heli karo maadaama oo qaabkan uu xadido faafitaanka neefsiga marka la barbardhigo dulka sanka. Mararka ay aad u daran tahay waxaa ku caan ah dadka waawaayn (dadka ka wayn 60 jirka, iyo gaar ahaan kuwa ka wayn 80 jirka).

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: Dalal badan oo soo koraya ma laha sariiro isbitaal oo ku filan tirada dadkooda, taas oo xadida awooda nidaamka caafimaadku uu kala tacaalayo hadii uu si lama filaan ah kor ugu kacdo dirada dadka ee qaba COVID-19 aadka u daran ee markaa u baahan isbitaalka.

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: Hal daraasad oo lagu sameeyay Jayna ayaa lagu ogaaday in 5% dadka ka dhigay waaxda daryeelka sare, 2.3% ay u baahdeen mishiinka taageerada neefsiga, oo 1.4% ay u dhinteen.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: Jayna, celcelis ahaan 30% dadka isbitaalka loo dhigay COVID-19 ayaa markii danbe waaxda ICU loo gudbiyay.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: Mishiinka neefsiga ayaa murugsanaaday markii xanuunka neefsigu uu kordhay (ARDS) marka uu kordho COVID-19 oo ogsajiin qaadashada ayaa aad u adkaata.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: Mishiino neefsi oo awooda inay qaabka cadaadiska ah inay maamulaa iyo PEEP sare ayaa loogu baahday si heerka ugu sareeya loo gaadhsiiyo gaadhsiinta ogsajiinta si loogu yareeyo khatarta neefsiga ee la xidhiidha dhaawaca sanbabka iyo preumothorax.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: PEEP-ka sare malaha mishiinada neefsiga ah ee hore.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: Daraasad ayaa muujinaysa in daawayntu ay ka bilaabmayso Janaayo 2020, oo dawooyinka fayruska caafimaad ahaan la tijaabin doono.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: Remdesivir ayaad moodaa inay tahay ta ugu faa'idada badan.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: In kasta oo dawooyinka cusub ay qaadan kartaan ilaa 2021 samayntoodu, dhawr kamid ah dawooyinkan ayaa la tijaabiyay oo hore loo ansixiyay si waxyaabo kale loogu isticmaalo ama marka hore heer sare maraya.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: Dawooyinka fayruska ayaa lagu tijaabin karaa dadka xanuunada daran qaba.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: WHO waxay sheegtay in dadka iskoodh isku xilqaada ay ka qayb qaadanayaan tijaabada wax ku oolnimada iyo amaanka daawaynta mustaqbalka. FDA waxay bixisay ogolaansho kumeel gaadh ah oo convalescent plasma-ha ah kaas oo ah daawayn tijaabo ah oo marka ay xaalada qofku aad u daran tahay ama uu u baahan yahay daawayn dhakhso ah.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: Weli lama samaynin tijaabo caafimaad oo muujinaysa maanka iyo waxtarka ay u leedahay xanuunka.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: Febraayo 2020, Jayna waxay samaysay app lagaga shaqaynayo safmarka xanuunka.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: Dadka isticmaalaya waxaa laga dalbanayaa inay gelitaan magaca iyo lambarka aqoonsiga.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: App-ku waxa uu awoodaa inuu la socdo 'dadka isku dhawaada' isaga oo adeegsanaya macluumaadka kormeerka iyo khatarta isqaadsiinta iman karta.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: Isticmaale kastaa waxa uu eegi karaa sidoo kale xaalada sadex isticmaale oo kale.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: Hadii la ogaado khatar iman karta, app-ku kaliya kuma talinayo in meel la isku soo xidho, waxa uu sidoo kale wargelinayaa saraakiisha maamulka deegaanka. Macluumaad badan ayuu tafatirayaa oo ku jira taleefanka qacanta, aqoonsiga wajiyada, la socodka mobileka iyo teknooloojiyad ayaa loo isticmaalayaa si iloola socdo dadka qaba caabuqa iyo dadka ay u dhawaadeen Koonfurta Kuuriya, Taywaan iyo Singaaboor.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: Maarso 2020, dawlada Israaiil ayaa u ogolaatay hay'ada maanka inay la socoto mobile-ka dakda looga shakisan yahay inay qabaan coronavirus.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: Talaabooyin ayaa la qaaday lagu dhaqan gelinayo karantiimada iyo in la ilaaliyo dadka u dhawaaday dadka qaba caabuqa.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: Sidoo kale Maarso 2020, Deutsche Telekom ayaa la wadaagtay macluumaad lagu sheegayo meesha taleefanka hay'ada dawlada federalka ee Jarmalka, Robert Koch Institute, si markaa loo baadho oo looga hortago faafitaanka fayruska.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ruushku waxa uu sameeyay teknooloojiyada lagu aqoonsanayo wajiga si loola socdo dadka jabiyay amarkoodii karantiimada.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: Gudoomiyaha caafimaadka deegaanka ee Talyaaniga Giulio Gallera waxay u sheegeen shirkada taleefanadu in "40% dadku iskaga socdaan siday doontaan."

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: Dalwada Jermalka ayaa samaysan 48 saacadood daraasad kombuyuutarka algu sameeyay labadii maalmood ee fasaxa ahaa oo ay ka qayb galeen wax ka badan 42.000 oo ruux.

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: Sidoo kale madaxweynaha Istooniyada, Kersti Kaljulaid, ayaa sameeyay baaq caalami ah oo xal loogu heleyo faafitaanka coronavirus/

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: Dadku way isku buuqi karaan inta ay ku jiraan karantiimada, xadidaada socdaalka, saamaynta caafimaad daro ee daawaynta ama iyaga oo ka baqanaya inay qaadaan.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: BBC-yada ayaa kasoo xigatay Rory O'Connor oo leh, "Korodhka aysoleeshinka dadka, kalinimada, warwarka, isku buuqa iyo xidhitaanka dhaqaale ayaa ah dabayl waxyeelo oo caafimaadka maskaxda iyo badqabka dadka ah."

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: Waxaa dhici karta inay yareeto waxyeelada xanuunku oo calaamado yar ama aan la yeelanba, kuwaas oo u dhigma xanuunada kale ee neefsiga sida hargabka.

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: Xanuunada yaryar caadiga waxaa lagaga lafnaadaa laba todobaad, halka kuwa daran ama aadka u daran ay qaadan karaan ilaa lix todobaad ka ladnaanshahoodu.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: Dumarka uurka leh ayaa khatar badan ku jiri kara inay qaadaan COVID-19 sida lagu ogaaday macluumaadka laga heley fayrusyada lamidka ah, sida SARS iyo MERS, laakiin macluumaadka COVID-19 weli way yar yihiin. Dadka qaar, COVID-19 waxa uu saamayn karaa sababka kaas oo keenaya xanuunada sanbabka.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: Marka uu aadka u daran yahay, COVID-19 waxa uu noqon karaa xanuunka neefsiga oo aad u daran (ARDS) kaas oo keena xanuun neefsiga ah, xanuunka sumawga dhiiga oo loo miyir beelo ama unugyada oo istaaga.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: Mushkilada la xidhiidha COVID-19 ee sumawga dhiiga, xinjiro aan caadi ahayn iyo waxyeelada wadnaha, kalyada, iyo beerka.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: Xinjirawga dhiiga ee aan caadiga ahayn waxa uu caadiyan kordhaa wakhtiga shaybaadhka dhiiga mudada ay qaadan kartaan xinjirawdy, waxaana la sheegey inay qabaan 6% dadka loo dhigay isbitaalka COVID-19, halka shaqada kalyada ee aan caadiga ahayn lagu arko 4% kooxdan.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: Celcelis ahaan 20-30% dadka lagu arkay COVID-19 waxa ay leeyihiin enzymes beerka ah oo sare (transaminases).

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: Isla warbixintaasi waxay sheegtey, wakhtiga u dhaxeeya marka calaamaduhu bilaabmaan iyo dhimashadu inay tahay toban maalmood, iyada oo shan lagu jiro isbitaalka.

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: Laakiin, bukaanka loo wareejiyo ICU waxa ay isku jirtaa wakhtiga u dhaxaysa marka la dhigo isbitaalka ilaa dhimashadoodu todoba maalmood.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay kiisaska hore, wakhtiga la arko calaamado yar ilaa dhimashadu waa 14 maalmood, kaas oo inta ugu dheerna tahay 41 maalmood.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: Daraasad ay sameeyaan Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran (NHC) ee Jayna, raga waxay leeyihiin xadi dhimasho oo ah 2.8% halka dumarkana xadigooda dhimashadu ay tahay 1.7%.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: Shaybaadhka Histopathological ah ee muunada sanbabka ee lagu eegay waxyeeada alveolar ee fubromyxiod ee laga saaray ee sanbabka.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: Isbadalka fayruska ayaa la badalay oo lagu arkay xanuunka sababka.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: Sawirka sanbabka waxaa lagu arkayay xanuunka aadka u daran ee neefsiga (ARDS).

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: 11.8% oo dhimashada ay soo sheegeen Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayna, waxyeelada wadnaha ayaa lagu arkay inuu keeno korodhka troponin ama wadnaha oo shaqo gaba.

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: Sida uu dhigayo macluumaadka Maarso laga heley Maraykanka, 89% oo dadka isbitaalka la dhigay waxay qabeen xanuun hore. Khayraadka dawooyinka ee la heli karo iyo dhaqan dhaqaalaha deegaan ayaa saamayn ku yeelan kara dhimashada.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: Qiyaastii dhigashadu way kala duwan tahay maadaama oo ay ka jiraan xaaladuhu oo deegaanadu kala duwan yihiin, laakiin sidoo kale maadaama oo ay jirto qaabka oo adagi.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: Yaraynta tirada kiisaska yaryar ee keena dhimashada waa la buun buuniyay.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: Laakiin, maadaama oo dhimashada uu keenay in wakhti hroe la qaaday waxay ka dhignaan karka ain xadiga dhimashada ee wakhtigan tiradeeda la yareeyay.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: Dadka caba sigaarka waxay 1.4 jeer ay ka badan yihiin inay yeeshaan xanuuno badan oo COVID-19 ah iyo celcelis ahaan 2.4 jeer inay korodho daryeelkooda sare ama u dhintaan marka loo eego dadka aan cabin sigaarka ah. Walaac ayaa laga muujiyay xanuunka mudada dheeree xanuunkan.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: Maamulka Isbitaal Hong Kong ah ayaa ogaaday inay hoos u dhacday 20% ilaa 30% awooda sanbabka ee dadka ka ladnaaday xanuunka, oo sawir laga qaaday sanbabka waxaa lagu arkay in waxyeelo soo gaadhay unuga.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: Tani waxay sidoo kael horseedi kartaa waxyeelo kasoo ladnaanshaha ah.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: Ilaa Maarso 2020, laga aqoon hadii xanuun kale iyo difaaca jidhka ee mudada dheer ah ee ka ladnaaday xanuunka uu keeno caabuq.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: In aanu waxba yeelin ayaa dhici karta, taas oo ku salaysan habdhaqanka kale ee coronavirus, laakiin kiisaska ka ladnaaday COVID-19 waxaa daba socday shaybaadh laga heley coronavirus oo markii danbe la sheegey.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: Kiisaskan waxaa loo arkayaa inay kasii daraan caabuqa kalka ay dib caabuq kale u noqon lahaayeen.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: Fayruska waxaa loo arkaa inuu yahay mid dabiici ah oo uu xayawaanka kasoo jeedo, oo uu yahay caabuq uga soo gudbay.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: Meesha rasmiga ah ee uu ka yimid lama garanayo, laakiin Diseember 2019 faafitaanka xanuunka ayaa gebi ahaanba isku gudbinayay dadka.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay 41 kiis ee ugu horeeyay ee la xaqiijiyay ee COVID-19, oo lagu baahiyay Janaayo 2020, The Lancet, waxaa lagu sheegey in taariikhda hore ee ay bilaabeen calaamaduhu ahayn 1 Diseember 2019.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: Warbixin rasmi ah oo ay soo saartay WHO ayaa lagu sheegey in calaamaduhu bilaabeen 8 Diseember 2019..

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: Dhawr cabiraad ayaa lagu sameeyay oo caan ah oo u qalanka dhimashada ah.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: Tirooyinkan waxa ku kala duwan deegaamada iyo mudada oo waxa ay saamayn karaa cabirka shaybaadhka, nidaamyada tayada daryeelka caafimaad, ikhtiyaarada daawaynta, wakhtiga ilaa markii uu bilaabmay iyo qaabka dakda sida da'da, jinsiga iyo caafimaadka guud.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: Dhamaadkii 2019, WHO waxay ku qortay ICD-10 xanuunka xeerka U07.1 ee dhimashada iyada oo laga duulayo inta uu shaybaadhku xaqiijiyay ee SARS-CoV-2 ee caabuqa ah iyo U07.2 ee dhimashada xarunta caafimaadka ama shaybaadhka xanuunada safmarka ee COVID-19 oo lagu xaqiijyay shaybaadhka caabuqa SARS-CoV-2. Xadiga dhimashada ee kiisaska waxay ay ka muuqataa tirada dhimasho oo loo qaybiyay tidada kiis ee la heley wakhti gaar ah oo cayiman.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: Iyada oo laga duulayo tirakoobka Jaamacada Hopkins, xadiga dhimashada kiisaska caalanku waa 6.9% (153,822/2.240,191) markii la gaadhay 17 Abriil 2020.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: Tiradu waxaa ku kala duwanaan kara deegaamada. Talaabooyin kale oo ay ku jiraan xadiga dhimashada (CFR), taas oo ay ka muuqato tirada laga heley ee shakhsiyaad ka u dhintay xanuunka, iyo xadiga dhigasha xanuunka (IFR), kaas oo ay ka muuqato boqolkiiba inta ay yihiin shakhsiyaadka (laga baadhay ama aan la baadhin) ee u dhintay xanuunka.

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: Tirakoobkan waxaa dhici karta in aanu wakhti lahayn oo aanu raacin muunad gaar ah oo kiisaska ladnaaday xanuunka.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: In kasta oo dhamaan dadku ayna wada yeelan antiboodhi, jiritaanka antiboodhiga ayaa bixin kara macluumaad ku saabsan tirada dadka ee qaaday xanuunka.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: Meelaha uu ku badan yahay ee Talyaaniga, Castiglione d'Adda, tuulo yar oo ilaa 4600 ku nool yihiin, 80 (1.7%) ayaa u dhintay.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: Galgelt, xanuunku waxa uu ku faafay munaasabad Kaarnifaal, oo waxa uu ku faafay dadka yaryar, kaas oo keenay marka loo eego tiro yar oo dhimasho, oo dhamaan dhimashada COVID-19 laguma wada sheegin inuu ka danbeeyay xanuunku.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: Sidoo kale, nidaamka caafimaadka Jermalka muu harqin.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: Needarlan, ilaa 3% ayaa yeeshay antiboodhi, sida lagu sheegey cida bixisay dhiiga.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: 69 (0.004% oo dadka ah) ayaa la xaqiijiyay inay u dhinteen COVID-19.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: Saamaynta xanuunka iyo xadiga u dhimatay ayaan wax badan ayna ku kala duwananayn raga iyo dumarku.

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: Dhimashadu waxay ku badan tahay raga daraadan lagu sameeyay Jayna iyo Talyaaniga.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: Khatartu waxay kusii badan tahay raga ku jira 50yaadka, farqiga u dhaxeeya raga iyo dumarkuna ay tahay kaliya 90.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: Jayna, xadiga dhimashada waxaa lagu sheegey 2.8 boqolkiiba inay tahay raga iyo 1.7 boqolkiiba dumarka.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: Sababta rasmiga ah ee jinsiyagu ugu kala duwan yihiin lama garanayo, laakiin hide sidaha iyo habdhaqanka ayaa noqon karan sabab keenta taas.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: Jinsiga oo ku salaysan kala duwanaanshaha difaaca jidhka, yaraanta cabista sigaarka ee dumarka iyo inay ragu yeeshaa xanuuno sida kacsanaan iyada oo yar marka loo eego dumarka ayaa markaa gacan ka gaysatay dhimashada badan ee raga.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: Yurub, 57% shakhsiyaadka qaaday xanuunka ee raga ah iyo 72% oo kuwaas ah ayaa u dhintay COVID-19 ayaa ahaa rag.
